name: Motion Explosion
description: The Games on Demand version supports English.  Download the manual for this game by locating the game on http://marketplace.xbox.com and selecting “See Game Manual".  This game requires a Kinect™ Sensor.  Challenge your reflexes, timing, and coordination by using your entire body to dodge, jump, kick, juggle and balance! Don’t hold back in this explosively entertaining family-friendly game that throws it all at you and makes you think fast on your feet!  • Master 12 electrifying  games like Juggle Struggle, Sack Hack and Crank It Up, with 10 levels of difficulty each • Grab friends and family for some outrageous fun in multiplayer mode • Relive sidesplitting moments after each activity with post-gameplay photos • Mix it up with inverse controls, faster paces, alternative control schemes and more!
